featured.name: BioNova-GenEditor
featured.summary: AI + IoT + Base blockchain platform for CRISPR gRNA design and lab monitoring; DNABERT on Groq; modular Next.js/Node/Python.
featured.description: A comprehensive platform combining AI-powered genomic editing with IoT lab monitoring and blockchain verification. Uses DNABERT for intelligent gRNA design recommendations, real-time IoT sensors for lab condition monitoring, and Base blockchain for secure data provenance.

featured.name: Technix-CRM
featured.summary: Modern CRM with Next.js + Node; form validation (Formik+Yup), responsive UI, optimized performance.
featured.description: Enterprise-grade Customer Relationship Management system built with modern web technologies. Features include advanced form validation, responsive design, real-time data synchronization, and performance-optimized architecture for handling large datasets.

featured.description: Decentralized event ticketing platform leveraging Ethereum NFTs to combat fraud and enable transparent secondary markets. Includes MetaMask wallet integration, smart contract deployment pipeline, and comprehensive testing framework.
